description: "Monster GoDJ Advanced Tutorial" is 10 video lecture series that is instructed by Pinnacle TheHustler. In this tutorial, Pinnacle goes further in depth regarding how to use the Monster GoDJ with more advanced techniques such as counting time signatures, advanced mixing, scratching and transitional techniques. Also you could learn general how to be a better DJ such as cutting, fading, EQ mixing, back spin etc.. For this course, listeners will need a Monster GoDJ and/or speakers or headphones. Enjoy this 'How you can be a good DJ with MonsterGODJ' tutorial series! At the end of this course you will realize that you already be a good DJ!
title: How you can be a good DJ with MonsterGODJ
